column4: sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pessenger.list copy paste this line on the empty file "deb http://apt.brightbox.net hardy main" save the file Crtl + O and exit the editor Crtl + X then use synaptic to install the libapache2-mod-passenger package
making it gives me an error regardless though. It says "make: *** [config.status] Error 2" and I'm unsure what I should do in the process of fixing the issue.
